name: Computer Network Architects_APRIL.2023
description: The Computer Network Architects Collection represents the skills necessary to design and implement computer and information networks by performing network modeling, analysis, and planning, including those of capacity needs for network infrastructures. This includes the responsibilities of design engineers, network and security engineers, and telecommunications analysts. This collection of skills was developed in partnership with a panel of subject matter experts who have worked as computer network architects.
creator: https://credentialengineregistry.org/resources/ce-036d082d-d80e-41a7-99a0-2d63a4ad3a4a
